__e: He had not responded now for 41 seconds, according to his unfailing internal clock, and it was time to come clean.
Well, Goldy, if my internal clock is correct, we've been here either an hour or a month.
The problem I'm having is, uh... - I have a pretty finely tuned internal clock... - Mm-hmm.
That attitude... that awareness on the part of a woman that time is ticking... is very sexy to a man.
Forgive her for what? "Again, my biological clock is ticking, "and the only person I would ever want to have a child with is you."
You always say you're done having kids, and he wants a baby so badly I can hear his clock ticking.
